actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-41.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 94-71.

official_title: Concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of the joint committee print of the Committee on Education and Labor and the Committee on Labor and Public Welfare entitled "A Compilation of Federal Education Laws."

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of 7,500 additional copies of "A Compilation of Federal Education Laws." States that 5,000 shall be for the use of the Committee on Education and Labor of the House of Representatives and 2,500 copies for the use of the Committee on Labor and Public Welfare of the Senate.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of the joint committee print of the Committee on Education and Labor and the Committee on Labor and Public Welfare entitled "A Compilation of Federal Education Laws."
